text:
M&M's World is a store that sells M&M's candy and other things. The first M&M's World store was on the Las Vegas Strip in 1997. There are now other stores in Orlando, Florida, New York City, Henderson, Nevada, London and Shanghai.
There are three floors of candy in many colors. There are other things inspired by M&Ms inspired items like aprons, oven mitts and T-shirts. The cost of buying the the M&M's at these stores is over US$12 per pound.
